CAREER SUMMARY
2016 to Present Grace GmbH – Dubai branch
2019 to date
Position: Senior HR Generalist MEA
2016 to 2009
Position: HR Specialist MEA
W.R. Grace and Company is an American chemical conglomerate headquartered in Columbia, Maryland and dealing with high-performance specialty chemicals and materials. Gist of her responsibilities:
Acting as the single HR point of contact for all employees in the MEA region and a strategic business partner for the business leadership team.
Advising the leadership team on government compliance and employee relations issues tackling emerging employment topics in a consistent and tactical manner.
Acting as one of the change agents for corporate initiatives in line with inclusion and diversity policies.
Managing recruitment, onboarding, employee records and performance management activities on SAP SuccessFactors, a cloud-based HR system.
Complete monthly payroll administration for the Middle East Region and payroll allocations to Finance. Final approver for South Africa and Kazakhstan payroll.
Complete recruitment activities including but not limited to: Shortlisting and interviewing candidates, Recruiter agreement management, competitive salary and benefit proposals etc.
Coordinating with Insurance brokers on annual medical and group life insurance plan set-ups. Also, acting as focal contact for coordination between insurer and employee in terms of claims and escalation of concerns raised.
Supporting the EMEA HR Director and Finance Controller in calculations associated with the Annual Operating Plans (Financial Forecasting based on prospective headcount) and EOSB accruals.
Coordinating with Vehicle lease provider on new contracts, annexures, renewals and cancellation of company-leased vehicles.
Planning and executing on employee engagement activities in the region and coordinating the annual employee engagement survey.
2013 to 2013 Seadrill
Position: Human Resource Administrator – AME
Seadrill is an offshore drilling company operating versatile rigs in different parts of the world. Her responsibilities are listed below
Drafted on-boarding and off-boarding process flow and procedure for Seadrill Dubai from scratch
Responsible for sending out contracts of employment for new hires in AME region (onshore and offshore)
Ensuring all certificates received by candidates meet the standards required for the position
Processing payroll for local employees and uploading salaries into WPS
Responsible for day-to-day HR operational work such as leave management, employment letters for varied purposes, Insurance management for AME region, Home leave travel calculations, filing etc.
Oracle Super User for AME region responsible for administration of the Oracle HRIS and generating all necessary reports for payroll SOX compliance
Responsible for preparing annual Salary Review and Bonus Letters for all AME region employees
Co-ordinating with the PRO for visas for new employees and for employees travelling to different countries visiting various rigs
Making EOS calculations and ensuring smooth cancellation of visas
Helped with drafting the local employee Handbook for Seadrill Dubai
Acted as Regional Survey Lead for Africa Middle East to administer the Employee Engagement Survey and ensure maximum participation
Responsible for Expat benefits administration such as Leases, utilities maintenance etc.
Managing crew coordination, training, payroll, SHL testing etc for a new rig operating in Abu Dhabi
2008 to 2013 KBR
Position: Human Resource Associate
Kellogg Brown and Root Inc. is the largest non-union construction company in the United States & was once, the world’s largest defense services provider. Her responsibilities were
Creating and maintaining Employee Master Data in SAP and report running.
Maintaining employee documents, benefits r
